comment: I loved this class. The lecture slides were always so good and he almost always let us out of class early. It's a super easy class and he is so kind. I would highly recommend!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Very easy A. The only assignments are 3 concert reports. Tests are open notes. Friendly professor.

While he's super nice, he cancelled class a lot which was kinda annoying because it was so last minute. In fact, we had more classes canceled that actually in person. He also doesn't respond to his email and will post assignment submissions like right when they're do, so for those that work ahead it's not worth it. Great prof tho!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Luke is AMAZING. Very chill. Only "big" assignments are 300-500 word concert reports. Covers modern (1890s and up) music history instead of older stuff, so it's fun. Does take attendance but it doesn't count for much of the grade. Honestly though, the lectures are so interesting that I'd recommend going to class anyway. Textbook isn't necessary.
